resources.string: Already have an account? Sign In
Don\'t have an account? Sign Up
Choose the level of access that you grant this client, as stated in the Smart Medical records access policy

Opening medical records Share allows you medical records to being accessible by any health practitioner registered with smart medical record cloud services. To filter out the practitioner who should access your medical, please providing the practitioner Id or email.
Share or Close Sharing of other\'s medical records as stated under Access Grant Policy

The policy states the conditions under which your medical records are open for sharing and can be accessed by medical practitioner(s).
 Your Records are accessible to different medical practitioners under the following conditions:
 • In case the Emergency Mode is enabled, then medical practitioner(s) can access the records provided.
 • In case the medical Practitioner is the one who created a record(s) initially.
 • Medical practitioner can also access your medical records if you have agreed him or her to be your personal medical practitioner.
 • Any Medical practitioner can access your medical records if you turn on medical record sharing, but you can also filter out such that your medical records to be accessed by a specific medical practitioner by providing his or her ID or Email on sharing section.
 • The Access Grant Client(s) can also open your medical record sharing in times of critical condition when you have no capability or strength to share the Medical record and therefor they do it on your behalf.
